content.rendered:
We work in countries across Eastern Europe, Southern and East Africa and South Asia to stop the institutionalisation of children.

Current areas where we work:

Africa

Kenya Kenya
Rwanda Rwanda
South Africa South Africa
Transform Alliance Africa Transform Alliance Africa

Asia

India India
Nepal Nepal

Europe

Bulgaria Bulgaria
Moldova Moldova
Romania Romania
Ukraine Ukraine

Previous areas where we’ve worked: 

  • Africa: Sudan
  • Africa: Sierra Leone
  • Africa: Eritrea
  • Europe: Albania
  • Europe: Belarus 
  • Europe: Bosnia and Herzegovina
  • Europe: Kosovo
  • Europe: Opening Doors – multi-country initiative
  • Latin America: Multi-country initiative
